channel.title: BUbuisnessAndMarket
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbuisnessAndMarket, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: U.S. consumer-confidence data on tap — visit the MarketWatch economic calendar
The alleged online smear campaign against Blake Lively is a reminder of how eager society is to ‘hate on women’
item.description: The "It Ends With Us" actress was likely the victim of an online smear campaign.

item.title: Trump’s demand for control of Greenland is immediately rejected
item.description: Greenland’s PM: “Greenland is ours. We are not for sale and will never be for sale.”

item.title: Musk urges Bezos to throw an ‘epic wedding’ after Amazon founder blasts report of $600 million nuptials as ‘completely false’
item.description: Bezos flatly denied a report he would marry fiancée Lauren Sánchez the weekend after Christmas in a lavish ceremony in Aspen.

item.title: Holiday week marked by Christmas-Hanukkah alignment. Markets could be restive.
Early release of durable-goods data shows U.S. manufacturing still struggling
U.S. stock market cues up index gains to kick off abbreviated week — follow live
Upscale department-store chain Nordstrom to go private after doing the math
Surging cases and lagging vaccines: Why this U.S. flu season has experts worried
item.description: Thirteen states reported high or very high levels of flu-like illness last week, about double from the week before.

item.title: Half of companies with office space say leases are affecting their RTO policies
item.description: Companies say they want to increase worker collaboration productivity, but many leaders are also influenced by existing office leases.
